subject: Follow-up call on enterprise proposal
notes: Discussed pricing structure and implementation timeline. Sarah confirmed budget approval is pending board review next week. Positive response to our technical capabilities demo.

subject: Sent contract revision for POS system
notes: Addressed Michael's concerns about integration with existing payment systems. Included revised terms for training and support. Expecting response by end of week.

subject: Project scope meeting with Creative Studio
notes: Met with Emily and her team to define website requirements. Discussed design preferences, timeline, and content migration needs. Very engaged and excited about the project.

subject: Initial discovery call with FinancePlus
notes: David outlined their compliance challenges and regulatory requirements. Large opportunity but long sales cycle expected. Need to involve technical team for next meeting.

subject: Proposal submitted to HealthTech
notes: Sent comprehensive proposal for data analytics platform. Highlighted ROI projections and security compliance features. Lisa mentioned decision timeline of 4-6 weeks.

subject: Research on TechCorp's competitors
notes: Analyzed their current tech stack and identified key pain points. Found that they're evaluating 3 other vendors. Our advantage is better integration capabilities and local support.

subject: Product demo for GlobalMart team
notes: Demonstrated POS system features to Michael and his technical team. Great reception, especially for inventory management integration. Asked for references from similar retail clients.
